nodes.text: Perosei was a member of the Naboo Palace Guards during the time of the Invasion of Naboo. He was known for his ability to take apart and reassemble a blaster in under a standard minute. During the invasion, he was a prisoner at Camp Four.

Perosei was played by an uncredited performer in the 1999 film Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, the first installment of the Star Wars prequel trilogy. In Star Wars Legends, the character's first name was established as "Baras."
